title: Ultimate Horror Music Box Bundle - 64 Tracks
description: Ultimate Horror Music Box Bundle - 64 Tracks

Preview 1

Preview 2


When we composed this series, we tried to create a creepy, suspenseful, dreary atmosphere.

Imagine that you are in a haunted house, and there are cursed dolls all around.

So if you are creating horror work, this music pack will be very helpful.

Also all loop files are ultimate SEAMLESS LOOPS!


If you are interested in another horror sound pack, here's the link.



We guarantee you high quality for every song.

Professional musicians from various countries are on for the project.

For sure, all the music is ROYALTY FREE.Â
